DOC.brief_summary: The investigator perform 12-week , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled human trial evaluate efficacy safety Ecklonia cava extract hyperlipidemia .
DOC.brief_title: Blood Lipid-lowering Effect Brown Alga Ecklonia Cava
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator perform 12-week , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled human trial evaluate efficacy safety Ecklonia cava extract hyperlipidemia . The investigator measure improvement lipid profile , include total cholesterol , triglyceride , HDL-cholesterol , LDL-cholesterol .
DOC.criteria: Mild hypercholesterolemic subject ( ≥200mg/dL total cholesterol ≥110mg/dL LDLcholesterol ) Selfreported pregnancy , lactation Prevalent heart disease , cancer , renal disorder , diabetes mellitus , use lipidlowering drug
